items.name: Pan de Sal
items.description: A classic Filipino bread roll, slightly sweet and perfect for breakfast or a snack.

items.name: Vegeterian Kimbap
items.description: Korean seaweed rice rolls filled with seasoned vegetables, offering a light and refreshing meal.

items.name: Tofu Siopao
items.description: A fluffy steamed bun filled with savory tofu, a vegetarian twist on a Filipino favorite.

items.name: Shokupan Toast
items.description: Thick-cut Japanese milk bread toasted to perfection, offering a soft and buttery experience.

items.name: Ube Roll Cake
items.description: A vibrant purple yam flavored sponge cake rolled with a creamy filling, a sweet Filipino treat.

items.name: Dalgona
items.description: A brittle candy made from melted sugar and baking soda, with a sweet and slightly bitter taste.

items.name: Coffee Jelly
items.description: A refreshing dessert made with coffee-flavored gelatin, often served with cream or milk.

items.name: Mochi
items.description: Soft and chewy rice cake filled with sweet red bean paste or other flavored fillings.

items.name: Filipino Macaroons
items.description: Chewy coconut-based macaroons, a sweet and satisfying Filipino snack.

items.name: Shokupan Fruit Sandwich
items.description: A delightful sandwich made with soft Japanese milk bread and fresh fruits, perfect for a light treat.

items.name: Milk Tea
items.description: A creamy and flavorful tea-based drink, customizable with your choice of tea and sweetness level.

items.name: Hot Tea
items.description: A comforting and aromatic beverage made by steeping tea leaves in hot water.

items.name: Inclusions
items.description: Add a burst of flavor and texture to your drink with these delicious toppings.

items.name: Drip
items.description: A classic and simple coffee brewed by slowly dripping hot water through ground coffee beans.

items.name: Vietnamese Coffee
items.description: A strong and sweet coffee brewed with a traditional Vietnamese filter, often served with condensed milk.

items.name: Espresso
items.description: A concentrated coffee beverage brewed by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

items.name: Mocha
items.description: A chocolate-flavored coffee drink made with espresso, chocolate, and milk.

items.name: Americano
items.description: A simple coffee drink made with espresso and hot water, similar to drip coffee but with a bolder flavor.

items.name: Latte
items.description: An espresso-based drink with steamed milk and a thin layer of foam.

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: An espresso-based drink with steamed milk and a thick layer of foamed milk.
